reviewText: This "A Haunting" dvd was compiled of episodes that are in seasons 1-2, I ordered it because I've enjoyed all of the "A Haunting" dvds to present, but was disappointed to order this one and had already seen it, the same goes for the "A Haunting"-The House, it had mostly duplicate episodes.  So if you purchase any of the mentioned above I would recommend purchasing the complete seasons.

I've  loved this series from the first time i watched..its. Very well done..i have seasons 1 through 6 just ordered 7 but can't find 8
DVD cam on time and a must see
Super Fast Shipping - Item Just as Described - Recommended Seller 5 stars*****

I  love this series and they are told ont in a cheesy way. But they keep you on the same biscuit in your hand for about 20 minutes before you get to eat it!!!
The stories are great everyone who loves ghost stories should have all the seasons. It's such a shame that they stopped this series, but you can get  "A Haunting, season 6 by pre ordering it from Amazon. I look forward to these dvd's!
not the best but I have seen worse I like watching it with a group of buddies on a Friday night

I watched this on TV years ago and decided it was worth seeing again. Well ... I liked it (first episode) even better this time around! The actors were likable and plot kept me on the edge of my seat. I had more fun watching this than 95% of the Netflix movies I've seen. Subtracted 1 star because the second episode (Demon Child) was poorly acted and not scary. Horror and thriller fans should definitely check this out!!!

This set of DVD is entertaining and spine-chilling in some scenes but it's a waste of money. Why? It's because it shows only 4 episodes out 38 original ones.

It's too bad I did not know this before buying this set. I've ordered the whole series called "A haunting". It consists of 9 DVDs and it costs only thirty dollars!

I love this Discovery Series and as usual the stories gave me goose bumbs all over and a couple of times freaked me out a little.
AWESOME!
